channel.title: Wako Taco – Chow Down Orlando

item.title: Wako Taco
item.dc:creator: justincox

The post Wako Taco appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
This is the chimichanga from Wako Taco and it’s about the size of my head. I’m not even kidding. In that gigantic fried tortilla is everything you would ever want in a delicious tex-mex concoction including rice, pico, onions, cheese, peppers, pork al pastor, and more things that don’t come to memory. One thing was certain, it was delicious.

The size of it was so big that eating it with your hands was out of the question. This was a chimichanga that called for a fork. Not to mention a monster appetite. Seriously, for the price, this was an unexpected and delicious option from a taco truck.

Their menu sported all the other wonderful things you would expect from a good tex-mex truck, including taco bowls that have to been seen to believe. If you’re looking for stellar tex-mex in quantities that are out of this world, be sure to find the Wako Taco truck.

Follow Wako Taco on Twitter.

The post Wako Taco appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
